content.en: Optimizing relay networks: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to address different research questions in the field of buffer-aided relay networks. These algorithms aim to optimize resource allocation, scheduling, relay selection, power allocation, and other aspects to improve the performance of cooperative networks. By using these algorithms, researchers hope to achieve efficient and reliable communication, maximize throughput, guarantee quality of service, and reduce latency in these networks.
content.da: Optimering af relænætværk: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at tackle forskellige forskningsspørgsmål inden for området bufferassisterede relænætværk. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at optimere ressourceallokering, planlægning, relævalg, strømfordeling og andre aspekter for at forbedre ydeevnen i kooperative netværk. Ved at bruge disse algoritmer håber forskere at opnå effektiv og pålidelig kommunikation, maksimere gennemstrømning, garantere kvalitetsservice og reducere latenstid i disse netværk.
